trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment" /> objects that can be individually accessed by index.

Except as noted, members of this class behave exactly as described by the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>, and <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> documentation.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스의 멤버에 설명 된 대로 정확히 동작 언급 했 듯이 점을 제외 하 고는 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>, 및 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> 설명서입니다.

trans-unit.source: **Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection> class provides several special features: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection> objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: **Freezable 기능:** 에서 상속 된 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> 클래스는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection> 클래스는 여러 가지 특수 기능을 제공: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection> 개선 하기 위해 읽기 전용으로 설정 하는 여러 개체 간에 공유 하는 대로 개체를 선언할 수 있습니다 성능, 복제 및 가집니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 제공 하는 다른 기능에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> 개체 참조는 [Freezable 개체 개요](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: XAML Implicit Collection Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 암시적 컬렉션 사용

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 값

trans-unit.source: *oneOrMorePathSegmentObjectElements*
trans-unit.target: *oneOrMorePathSegmentObjectElements*

trans-unit.source: One or more <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> objects, declared using object element syntax.
trans-unit.target: 하나 이상의 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> 개체 요소 구문을 사용 하 여 선언 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection" />.
Initializes a new instance of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection" />.
The collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment" /> objects that make up the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection" /> class with the specified collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment" /> objects.
<paramref name="collection" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The number of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment" /> objects that the collection is initially capable of storing.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection" /> class with the specified capacity, or the number of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment" /> objects the collection is initially capable of storing.
The segment to add to the collection.
Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment" /> to the end of the collection.
Because <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> objects derive from <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>, they are copied when they are used.
trans-unit.target: 때문에 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> 개체에서 파생 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>, 사용 될 때 복사 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you might not be able to later retrieve or remove the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> you added to the collection using the original <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> object; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> in the collection is a copy of the original <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> and is considered a different <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> than the one you added.
trans-unit.target: 따라서 나중에 검색 하거나 제거 못할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> 원래를 사용 하 여 컬렉션에 추가한 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> 개체는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> 컬렉션은 원래 복사본 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> 다른 것으로간주됩니다<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> 추가한 것입니다.

trans-unit.source: Unlike typical implementations of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, this implementation throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if you attempt to add a **null** (**Nothing**) reference.
trans-unit.target: 일반적인 구현과 달리 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>,이 구현에서 throw 한 <xref:System.ArgumentException> 추가 하려고 하면는 **null** (**Nothing**) 참조 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection" /> is read-only.
\- or -
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection" /> has a fixed size.
Clears the collection of all segments and resets <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Count" /> to zero.
This method does not change the capacity of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는의 용량을 변경 하지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection" /> is read-only.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 수정 가능한 복사본을 생성 하기 위해이 메서드는 고정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> 개체 (또는 모든 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> 개체).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 편의 위해이 메서드는 강력한 형식의 구현이 포함 된 상속 된 버전을 숨깁니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>을 참조하세요.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 수정 가능한 복사본을 생성 하기 위해이 메서드는 고정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> 개체 (또는 모든 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> 개체).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 편의 위해이 메서드는 강력한 형식의 구현이 포함 된 상속 된 버전을 숨깁니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>을 참조하세요.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment" /> to search for.
Returns a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> that indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment" /> is contained within the collection.
<see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment" /> is contained within the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The array into which the collection's items are to be copied.
The index of <c>array</c> at which to start copying the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection" />.

Copies the entire <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection" /> to a one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment" /> array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
<paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
<paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
-or-

The number of items in the source <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection" /> is greater than the available space from <paramref name="index" /> to the end of the destination <paramref name="array" />.
Gets the number of path segments contained in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection" />.
The number of path segments contained in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 에 포함 된 경로 세그먼트의 수는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection" />합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the collection.
An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator" /> that can iterate through the collection.
Enumerators only allow reading the data in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 열거자는 컬렉션의 데이터 읽기를 허용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 내부 컬렉션을 수정 하 여 열거자를 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 처음에 열거자는 컬렉션의 첫 번째 항목 앞에 배치 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: also brings the enumerator back to this position.
trans-unit.target: 또한이 위치로 복원 열거자를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: At this position, calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 이 위치에서, 호출 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> 예외를 throw 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> to advance the enumerator to the first item of the collection before reading the value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 따라서 호출 해야 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> 하 여 열거자의 값을 읽기 전에 컬렉션의 첫 번째 항목에 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> returns the same object until either <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>에서는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A>이 호출될 때까지 동일한 개체를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> sets <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> to the next item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> 설정 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> 다음 항목으로 합니다.

trans-unit.source: After the end of the collection is passed, the enumerator is positioned after the last item in the collection, and calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션의 끝이 전달 된 후 열거자는 컬렉션의 마지막 항목 뒤에 배치 하 고 호출 되 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> 반환 `false`합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the last call to <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> returned `false`, calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 마지막으로 호출 하는 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> 반환 `false`호출, <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> 예외를 throw 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To set <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> to the first item of the collection again, you can call <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> followed by <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하려면 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> 다시 컬렉션의 첫 번째 항목을 호출 하면 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> 이어서 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 열거자는 컬렉션이 변경되지 않은 상태로 유지되는 한 유효한 상태를 유지합니다.

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying or deleting items, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션 변경 되 면, 추가 하는 등 수정 또는 삭제 항목 열거자는 무효화 하 고을 다음에 호출할 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> throw는 <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the collection is modified between <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> will return the item that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated.
trans-unit.target: 사이 컬렉션이 수정 되는 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> 열거자가 이미 무효로 되 었 하는 경우에로 설정 되어 있는 항목을 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 열거자는 컬렉션에 배타적으로 액세스하지 못하므로 컬렉션을 열거하는 것은 본질적으로 스레드로부터 안전한 프로시저가 아닙니다.

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션이 동기화 되어 있을 때 다른 스레드에서 수 수정할 열거자에서 예외가 발생 하는 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 열거하는 동안 스레드로부터 안전을 보장하려면 전체 열거를 수행하는 동안 컬렉션을 잠그거나 다른 스레드에서 변경된 내용으로 인해 발생한 예외를 catch하면 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The item to search for.
Returns the index of the first occurrence of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment" />.
The index of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment" />.
The index at which to insert <c>value</c>, the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment" />.
The item to insert.
Inserts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment" /> into this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection" /> at the specified index.

Unlike typical implementations of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Insert%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, this implementation throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if you attempt to insert a **null** (**Nothing**) reference.
trans-unit.target: 일반적인 구현과 달리 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Insert%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>,이 구현은 throw는 <xref:System.ArgumentException> 를 삽입 하려고 시도 하는 경우는 **null** (**Nothing**) 참조 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="index" /> is not a valid index in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection" /> is read-only.
\- or -
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection" /> has a fixed size.
The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment" /> object to get or set.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment" /> at the specified zero-based index.
The item at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 인덱스에 있는 항목입니다.

trans-unit.source: Unlike typical implementations of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Item%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, this implementation throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if you attempt to insert a **null** (**Nothing**) reference.
trans-unit.target: 일반적인 구현과 달리 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Item%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>,이 구현은 throw는 <xref:System.ArgumentException> 를 삽입 하려고 시도 하는 경우는 **null** (**Nothing**) 참조 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="index" /> is not a valid index in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection" /> is read-only.
\- or -
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection" /> has a fixed size.
The item to remove from this collection.
Removes the first occurrence of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment" /> from this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection" />.
<see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment" /> is removed from the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection" /> is read-only.
\- or -
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection" /> has a fixed size.
The index of the item to remove.
Removes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment" /> at the specified index from this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection" />.
For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1.IsReadOnly" />.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection" /> is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />가 읽기 전용이면 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현이며,

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection> 인스턴스가 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> 인터페이스로 캐스팅된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1.GetEnumerator" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1" /> object that can be used to iterate through the collection.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현이며,

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection> 인스턴스가 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> 인터페이스로 캐스팅된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: A zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that receives the copied items from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection" />.
The first position in the specified <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to receive the copied contents.
For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)" />.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현이며,

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection> 인스턴스가 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 인터페이스로 캐스팅된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized" />.
